Delyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loan from Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF). She is borrowing 26,000 Philippine pesos through NWTF to purchase wood, paint, nails, etc., for the repair of her fishing boat for her business. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase wood, paint, nails, etc., for the repair of her fishing boat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy 20 sheep for fattening and resale.

loans.name: Victor Jesus

texts.es:
Víctor es un joven soltero quien vive con su madre en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas en un barrio muy humilde y  poco alejado del sector urbano. Viven en casa propia varios años, su madre es la que le ha dado la educación desde pequeño; Víctor creció y actualmente trabaja como albañil para ayudar a su madre, además cuenta con una pequeña chanchera hecha de madera y un criadero de pollos, gracias a su trabajo él ha podido comprar chanchos y pollos y contar con otra fuente de ingreso, su madre le ayuda mucho en el cuidado de los animales cuando él no está.
Víctor se siente feliz al saber que él también ayuda aportando en los ingresos para su familia, a pesar de su corta edad es un joven muy responsable, se levanta muy temprano a dejar limpio el criadero de los animales y luego sale a su trabajo diario, los fines de semana el faena los chanchos y vende la carne a sus vecinos.
Víctor Acudió a la institución por referencia de un tío quien es cliente, con este crédito podrá mejorar la chanchera y construirá un galpón de pollos más grande, ya que desea incrementar la producción; también va a comprar más chanchos y pollos porque desea crecer como microempresario y darse a conocer.
texts.en:
Victor is a young single man who lives with his mother in the city of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, a very humble neighborhood a bit removed from the urban area sector. They have lived in their own home for several years; his mother is the one who’s given him an education since childhood. Victor grew up and he currently works as a construction worker to help his mother; he also has a small wooden pigpen and a chicken coop. Thanks to his job, he has been able to purchase pigs and chickens and have another source of income. His mother helps a lot with animal care when he’s not home.

Victor is happy to know that he’s also helping with the family income; despite his short age, he is a very responsible young man. He gets up very early to clean the pigpen and chicken coop and then goes to his day job. On the weekends, he butchers the pigs and sells the meat to his neighbors. Victor was referred to this institution by his uncle, who is a client. With this loan, he will be able to improve the pigpen and build a bigger chicken barn, since he would like to increase production. He will also buy more pigs and chickens because he would like to grow as a micro-entrepreneur and make himself known.

loans.use: purchase more pigs and chickens and to build a bigger chicken barn and improve the pigpen

loans.name: Zoila Rosario

texts.es:
Zoila vive junto a sus dos hijos en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los  Tsachilas ciudad de la región costa, con un clima agradable. Es una ciudad muy comercial la misma que es considerada puerto terrestre que une a la sierra y a la costa.
Hace varios años Zoila se dedica a la venta de asados, desde temprano sale al mercado a comprar lo necesario para el día, compra carnes, cuero, mollejas y demás; cuenta con un triciclo adecuado donde cocina y todas las tardes en la cancha del sector Zoila está vendiendo sus platitos de asados.
Zoila también cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien trabaja en el municipio de la ciudad recogiendo basura. Comenta que se siente muy feliz porque tiene el apoyo incondicional de su familia, sus hijos son el motor para salir adelante, siempre están pendientes de su educación y de su bienestar, actualmente están construyendo una casa porque ya desean contar con algo propio después de tantos años de trabajo.
Zoila ha trabajado muy duro por sus pequeños, en especial por uno ya que él necesita una mayor atención por tener discapacidad, por eso ella ve la forma de poder aportar con ingresos a la familia ya que cada semana tienen que hacerle terapias. 
Por ello Zoila con este crédito podrá comprar materia prima para su negocio y además quiere seguir construyendo su casa que falta mucho por terminar. Se siente agradecida por el apoyo de las instituciones que ayudan a los microempresarios.
texts.en:
Zoila lives with her children in the city of Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas, coastal city with great weather. This is a busy commercial area, with an onshore port that connects the hills with the coast.
Several years ago, Zoila started selling grilled dishes. She goes to the market early in the morning to buy everything she needs for the day. She buys meats, skin,  sweetbread and more. She owns a food cart that is designed for her cooking and every afternoon she parks by the the neighborhood soccer field to sell her grilled dishes.
Zoila also has support from her husband who is a garbage collector working for the municipality. She says she is really happy because she has full support from her family. Her children are the force driving her to keep going. She is always thinking about their education and well-being. They are currently building a home because they would like to have something of their own after so many years of hard work.
Zoila has worked very hard for her little ones, especially one of them who has a dissability. This is one of the reasons why she wants to generate an additional income to help with his therapy.
With this loan, Zoila will be able to buy basic items for her business, and also continue building her home that it's almost finished. She is very grateful for the support she receives from this institutions that help small entrepreneurs.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her business and save money to finish building her home

loans.name: Lumber 2 Group

texts.es:
CARMEN es una mujer joven, casada y con 6 maravillosos hijos, quienes habitan en su humilde casa en Borbon. Su esposo por razones de salud no puede trabajar en un empleo normal, por esta razon apoya a sus esposa en la tienda de alimentos y en la cria de cerdos. Sus hijos asisten a la escuela.
Es la primera vez que tiene un credito con VisionFund y desea trabajar mucho para poder cambiar su estilo de vida y el de sus hijos. 
Ella es muy dinàmica y a màs de atender su tienda y sus hijos, tambien cria cerdos en el patio de su casa.
desea ver mas grande su tienda y ahorrarà para en un corto tiempo poder tener una despensa mas completa y organizada.
en su comunidad no cuentan con servicio de alcantarillado, pero si tienen agua potable.
se considera una persona muy trabajadora y con deseos inmensos de trabajar en su pueblo.
texts.en:
Carmen is a married young woman who has 6 wonderful children that live with her in their humble home in Borbon. Her husband, due to health issues, cannot work a normal job; for this reason, he assists his wife at the grocery store and with pig breeding. Their children attend school.

This is her first loan with VisionFund and she very much would like to work hard to be able to change their lifestyle and that of their children. She is very dynamic and besides tending to her store and her children, she also breeds pigs in their home’s backyard. She wants to see her store grow and will save money so that in a short amount of time, she is able to offer a more complete and organized pantry. There is no sewer service in her community, but they do have potable water. She considers herself a very hard working person who has a vast desire to work in her community.

loans.use: purchase pasta, pigeon peas, oils, unrefined sugar, cheese, bread, sugar and rice for her grocery store as well as strengthening her purchase and sale of pigs.

loans.name: Monica Del Rocio

texts.es:
Mónica es madre soltera, tiene una hija, con quien vive en casa de familiares en la  ciudad de Santo Domingo, una zona con un clima agradable y  muy comercial.
A pesar de no contar con el apoyo del padre de su hija ella ha visto la manera de salir adelante, ha contado con el apoyo de sus padres a quien agradece tanto. Mónica durante años ha trabajado en talleres de costura dando servicio de maquilada, cuenta con un sueldo fijo, con el mismo que ha podido darle la educación a su hija, además de poder ahorrar y así comprar unas máquinas de coser.
Esto ha llevado mucho esfuerzo y dedicación para conseguir su sueño, actualmente tiene unas máquinas de coser pero necesita de una muy importante y además de materia prima para poder abrir su negocio, ya que tiene mucha experiencia en esta rama y desea aprovechar sus conocimientos, porque desea pasar más tiempo con su familia y quiere ayudar a señoras que necesiten aprender la costura.
Mónica con el crédito obtenido hará su sueño realidad, podrá abrir al público su negocio propio que le ha costado mucho esfuerzo, con el dinero podrá comprar una maquina recubridora y telas para empezar a fabricar los uniformes escolares ya que esta época está por comenzar. Está muy segura que saldrá adelante y que en un futuro su taller será reconocido.
Agradece a quienes conforman kiva ya que gracias al aporte las personas pueden empezar su negocio
texts.en:
Mónica is a single mother. She has one child with whom she lives in the family house in the city of Santo Domingo, a very commercial area with an agreeable climate.

In spite of not having the support of the father of her daughter she has found a way to get ahead. She has the support of her parents whom she is very grateful to. Mónica for years has worked in sewing workshops sewing. She has a fixed salary and with that she has been able to educate her daughter and besides has been able to save and buy some sewing machines. This has taken much effort and dedication to fulfill her dream.

Currently she has some machines but needs one more important one and also raw material to be able to open her business. She has a lot of experience in the field and wants to take advantage of her knowledge as she wants to spend more time with her family. She also wants to help young women who need to learn to sew.

Mónica will make her dream a reality with the loan. she will be able to open her own business which has cost her so much effort to the public. With the money she will buy a cover stitch machine and cloth to start making school uniforms as school is about to start. She is quite sure that she will be successful and that her shop will be known in the future. She thanks those are part of Kiva as thanks to the support of these people she can start her business.

loans.use: to buy a cover stitch machine and cloth.

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru: Эту женщину зовут Мавчуда. Ей 44 года. Она жительница города Душанбе. Мавчуда замужем и имеет одну дочь. Ее муж в городе занимается таксистом. Дочка помогает ей в работе и ведет домашнее хозяйство.  Мавчуда серьезная и спокойная женщина. Она 5 лет уже занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ. Мавчуда хочет поменять швейную машинку и улучшить процесс работы. Ваш кредит поможет ей приобрести швейную машинку и привлечь больше клиентов. Ей очень нужно Ваша поддержка.
texts.en: Meet Mavjuda, a 44-year-old resident of the city of Dushanbe.  Mavjuda is married and she has one daughter.  Her husband works as a taxi driver in town.  Her daughter helps her with the business and also takes care of the household.  Mavjuda is a serious and quiet woman.  She has been taking orders and sewing women's clothes for five years already.  She now wants to replace her sewing machine in order to improve her work. Your loan will help her to buy a new sewing machine and will allow her to attract more customers.  Mavjuda truly needs your support.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and improve her work.

loans.name: Gulniso

texts.ru:
Это Гулнисо. Она жительница городка Куляб. Ей 36 лет. Гулнисо замужем и мать троих детей. У нее двое дочери и один сын. Дочкам 16 и 13 лет. Сыну 13 лет. Дети учатся в средней школе. Муж продавец. Он в обувном магазине продает обувь. 
Гулнисо трудолюбивая и талантливая женщина. Она у себя дома занимается шитьем женской одежды. Гулнисо более 2 лет продвигает эту деятельность. На данный момент Гулнисо необходимо поменять машинку, чтобы источник дохода. Нынешняя машинка не выполняет свои функции достаточно хорошо. Гулнисо просит кредит для купли швейной машинки. Также на оставшуюся часть денег она хочет отремонтировать комнату.
texts.en: Meet Gulniso, a resident of the city of Kulob.  She is 36 years old, married, and the mother of three children (two daughters and one son).  Her daughters are 16 and 13 years old.  Her son is also 13.  Her children attend secondary school.  Gulniso's husband works in retail and sells shoes in a shop.  Gulniso is a hardworking and skilled woman who works as a seamstress from home.  She has been involved in this activity for more than two years.  At the moment, and in order to keep her source of income, she needs to replace her sewing machine as the current one no longer fulfills its functions properly.  Gulniso is taking a loan to buy a sewing machine.  With the rest of the money, she wants to renovate one room in her house.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and to renovate one room.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.es:
La socia Macaria pertenece al banco comunal REYNA DE LOS ANGELES, la socia continua  dedicándose  al negocio de venta de chicha de jora, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, él maíz es una bebida a base de maíz ,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar maíz entre otros.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Macaria belongs to the "Reyna De Los Angeles" (Queen of The Angels) communal bank.  She still makes her living selling "chicha de jora," a fermented corn drink made with maize specially prepared for making high-grade chicha.  Macaria is a responsible and diligent person.  She wants to continue working so she can keep supporting her family. 
Macaria is requesting the loan to purchase corn and other items. 
She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with her repayment plan.

loans.use: to purchase corn and other items.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
As a way of generating income, Catherine has been selling retail products from her small sari-sari store in Pasay City for almost a year now. She is 24 years of age and blessed with one child. With her husband, Roylan, they work hand in hand to provide for their family’s needs.

In the Philippines, sari-sari stores are everywhere. Sari-sari (a term used for variety) stores sell different kinds of products from biscuits, candies, can goods, noodles, products used for personal hygiene and the like, which are involved in every individual’s daily living. This is considered one of the most common businesses built by ordinary people since it provides commodities for people. 

That is why Catherine plans to expand her business. Unfortunately, she doesn't have enough capital. For this reason, she would like to take out a loan of 12,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy additional products for her sari-sari store. Being a kind and friendly mother, she is hoping that she will further improve the business through this financial assistance.

Catherine dreams of improving her business to have her own house someday and to be able to help her child finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members* to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional products for her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia owns and operates a food stall. She has been successful in this business for many years, and she repaid her previous loan used for the business. She also finds ways to improve her income through her small food stall. Relative to this, she would like to take out a new loan to increase her profit. She is requesting an amount of 10,000 Philippine pesos to buy products like meat, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings in larger quantities.

Virginia hopes for her business to grow bigger and better. She dreams of giving her family a good life in the future. 

Virginia meets up with her co-fellowship members* to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients, such as rice, pork, chicken, vegetables and other products, needed in her business.

loans.name: Analy

texts.es:
La socia Analy pertenece al banco comunal REYNA DE LOS ANGELES.
La socia tiene 31 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es soltera,  la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras como zanahorias, tomates entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar tomates, cebollas entre otros.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Analy belongs to the "Reyna De Los Angeles" (Queen of the Angels) communal bank.  She is 31-years old, has one son and is single.  She divides her time between her housework and her busienss selling vegetables like carrots, tomatoes etc.  Analy is a responsible, diligent person who wants to continue working so she can keep supporting her family.  
Analy is requesting the loan to purchase tomatoes, onions and other items. 
She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with her repayment plan.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, onions and other items.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
This is Joseph. He previously accessed a 15,000 Philippine peso (PHP) loan that he utilized to buy more quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings, and frozen food products. His earnings were a big help in their personal, household and business expenditures.

Joseph would like to apply for a 12,000 PHP loan to buy other products to add to his inventory. The more items displayed at his store the better. More recipes to sell will result in better profit. His profits from the business will definitely help him to meet their daily needs. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart.

Joseph hopes for his business to prosper and for his family to be always in good condition. Likewise, he also dreams of his children finishing their schooling to have a secure future. He meets up with his co-fellowship members* to share stories of his life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God he studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional materials and other products needed in his business.

loans.name: Dzhamila

texts.ru: Джамила, 62 года, замужем. У Джамилы среднее образование, она на пенсии, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством, полеводством, стартовав более 40 лет назад, благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Джамилы, на сегодняшний день у нее есть лошадь и 15 овец, также на 2,15 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли выращивает клевер, сафлор, ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Джамила обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) для покупки семян клевера. Джамила намерен расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала ее семьи, также она мечтает поехать на отдых в пансионат у побережья озера.
texts.en: Dzhamilla is 62 years old and married.  She has a secondary education and receives a pension.  As an additional source of income for her family, she raises livestock and grows crops, two activities which she started more than 40 years ago.  Thanks to her perseverance, dedication and hard work, she currently owns one horse and 15 sheep.  She also owns 2.15 hectares of land and rents another hectare on which she cultivates clover, safflower and barley for domestic consumption on the farm and for resale.  She has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to buy clover seeds.  Dzhamilla wants to grow her business, which will directly lead to an increase in her family's capital.  She is also dreaming of going on vacation and of staying in a guesthouse by the side of a lake.

loans.use: to buy clover seeds to grow organic crops.

loans.name: Doris  Yesenia

texts.es: Doris de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus padres y hermana,  ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños y niñas, posee 5 años de experiencia su negocio el cual está ubicado en el mercado municipal que está cerca de su casa, con las ventas que realiza ayuda en los gastos de su casa, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa para niños y niñas por mayor y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos
texts.en: Doris is 39-years old.  She lives in her own home with her parents and her sister.  Doris makes her living selling boys' and girls' clothing.  She has five years of experience in the busienss, which is located in the city market near her home.   Her sales allow her to help with the household expenses.  Doris is requesting a loan to purchase more wholesale boys' and girls' clothing so she can earn a larger income.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale boys' and girls' clothing.

loans.name: Elice

texts.es:
Elice está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, es una persona muy sacrificada que está poniendo todo de sí para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Ella quiere ser alguien en la vida y es por eso que pone todo de sí, y lo logra con su sacrificio.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la cuota de su carrera, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene.
texts.en:
Elice is studying nursing.  She is a very selfless person who is giving her all to be somebody in this life. 
Elice wants to be somebody in this life, and that is why she is giving her all, and her sacrifice is getting her there. 
She is requesting this loan to invest in her university fees.  Once paid, she can continue with her studies, as she is currently doing.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Lorena Rubia

texts.es: Lorena de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene 10 años de experiencia, con las ventas que realiza es como logra salir adelante con los gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal todo por mayor para continuar con la venta de tortillas  y poder tener mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Lorena is 37-years old.  She lives in her own home with her three children.  Lorena makes her living selling tortillas.  Her business is set up in her home, and she has ten years of experience in the business.  By selling her tortillas, Lorena is able to get ahead with her household expenses.   She is requesting the loan to purchase wholesale lime and hundredweights of corn so she can continue selling tortillas, earn a better income and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale lime and hundredweights of corn.

loans.name: Ma. Victoria

texts.en:
Ma. Victoria is a very hardworking entrepreneur from Pasay City. She is 38 years old and blessed with one child. Together with her husband Ricardo, a driver, they manage a buy-and-sell business.The income they get from the business is helping them with their everyday needs and expenses. In addition to this, they also operate a small house rental business which is another source of income for the family. 

What she basically does is buy general merchandise from wholesalers and then sell them piecemeal with a little profit. Products can range from hand soaps and other personal hygiene products and the like. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low selling prices and the many options they are offered. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

Ma. Victoria is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan to purchase more products and merchandise to sell. She will use her loan to improve her sales and her additional revenue to improve the general living conditions of her family.

In the future, she hopes to prosper through her business and have her own department store. She also dreams of her child finishing school. She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To purchase more products and merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Urcisina

texts.en:
Urcisina engages in the tuba (coconut wine) vending business.  She sells tuba to the locals in her place.  She has been engaged in tuba vending for more than 10 years.  She is a 65-year-old woman from Loon, Bohol. She has five grown children.

Urcisina has requested a loan in the amount of 15,000 PHP to buy more supplies of tuba and tungog (a kind of mangrove bark used in flavoring coconut wine). Thus, this will help improve her stock and be able to cater to her customers when the demand goes up. Thus, she could now set aside some savings and start to expand her existing business. 

 In the future, she dreams of opening a sari-sari (variety) store for sustainable living.

loans.use: to buy more supplies of tuba (coconut wine) and tungog (a kind of mangrove bark used in flavoring coconut wine)

loans.name: Xiaoying

texts.en:
Xiaoying is 42 years old and is a divorced woman living with two children. Many years ago, Xiaoying was working together with her husband, and for the sake of taking care of young daughters, they returned to their hometown. Unfortunately, when they went back to their hometown, her husband became addicted to gambling. This kind of life lasted a long time and her husband squandered a large amount of money. Xiaoying could not bear this anymore, so she chose to divorce him. Her husband did not give any subsidies to Xiaoying and her children, and what’s worse, he fraud for RMB 100,000 from Xiaoying’s father. 

Although a lot of unhappy things happened in her life, she still has confidence in life. She borrowed money from her relatives and friends, and opened a teahouse. The teahouse business is generally, which could not allow them to purchase enough things with their small incomes. Xiaoying requested ¥20,000 CNY from Microcred; this is the her third loan. Her repayment history has gone very well. She will use part of the money to pay the house rent, and the rest of the money will be used for her daughters' education fee. Xiaoying is full of confidence in the future. She believes in herself and that she has the ability to lead a better life.

loans.use: to pay the house rent and her daughter's education fee

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Arlene works hard to support her family.

She has a raising-pigs business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. Arlene is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig for her raising-pigs business.

Arlene has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig

loans.name: Arlita

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Arlita works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice. Arlita is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her restaurant business.

Arlita has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Marilou works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell seafood business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fishing and a general store. Marilou is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more seafood such as shrimp, crabs, oyster and other seafood to sell.

Marilou has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more seafood such as shrimp, crabs, oyster and other seafood to sell

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego hoy ya es un profesional recibido, comenta que gracias al préstamo obtenido ha podido solventar sus estudios, y recibirse, es una persona muy buena en lo que hace. Él comenta que hoy esta estudiando nuevamente, sigue didáctica superior universitaria, y con ello quiere seguir creciendo para ir creciendo.
Pide este prestamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios, capacitandose cada día.
texts.en:
Diego has already received his professional training. He says that he was able to pay for his studies and earn his degree thanks to his previous loan. Diego is the type of person who is very good at what he does. He says that he is continuing his studies so that he can teach at the university level. Diego wants to keep growing for the sake of growing.

He is requesting this loan so that he can pay for his degree fees. As a result, he will be able to continue his studies and obtain more training each day.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Davronbek

texts.ru:
Давронбек  жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 30 лет. Он женат и имеет 2-их детей. Он обратился в МДО “Арванд” когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку для развития своего бизнеса. Сам Давронбек живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не учился в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Давронбека также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.
Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Давронбек занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также Давронбек подрабатывает строителем, занимается пчеловодством.  От данного дела он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Давронбеку в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Давронбек хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился МДО “Арванд” и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Давронбек очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит МДО “Арванд” за поддержку.
texts.en:
Davronbek is a cheerful and hard-working man of 30 years. He is married and has 2 children. He approached MDO Arvand when he realized that he could receive financial support to develop his business. Davronbek lives with his family in a rural area. He does not have a higher education; he did not study at university due to his family's financial difficulties. Davronbek's wife also does not have an education, and is a housewife. She does housework and raises their children.

To have a means of sustenance, Davronbek runs his own business. He fattens and sells cattle. He also does some work on the side as a builder, and he is a beekeeper. He makes a good living from these occupations. His wife also helps Davronbek with his business, and sells the milk they get from the cattle. Now Davronbek wants to increase his number of cattle so he can expand his business. With this in mind, he has approached MDO Arvand for a loan to buy cattle. Davronbek is very hopeful for a positive outcome and thanks MDO Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Ana Mirian

texts.es: Ana de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 20 años su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para poder continuar con la elaboración de tortillas y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos
texts.en:
Ana, who is 49 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their three children. She has been selling tortillas for 20 years. Her business is located in her home, and she has many customers. With the sales that she makes, she manages to pay some of the expenses of her household. 

She is applying for a loan for the purchase of corn by the quintal (about 100 pounds) and lime in order to be able to continue making tortillas and thus be able to have better economic income.

loans.use: to buy corn in hundred-pound quantities and lime

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino tiene 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de San Felipe, una comunidad de clima cálido, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de frutales y arroz, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo y venta de lima, cuenta con fincas de lima un aproximado de 02 ha de finca frutera, lo cosecha de manera mensual el cual lo vende en su caserío a los comerciantes de frutas quienes la llevan a comercializar a otras ciudades. Ha solicitado un préstamo para el pago de mano de obra por mantenimiento y compra de abonos para el cultivo de lima y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Faustino is 57 years old and lives with his wife and children in the District of San Felipe, a community with a warm climate. The people engage in agriculture (especially the cultivation of fruit and rice), trade, and livestock breeding. This area is located in Jaén Province, which is part of the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

Faustino cultivates and sells limes on his fruit farm that measures approximately two hectares. He harvests fruit on a monthly basis and sells his output in his village to fruit merchants who transport the product to other cities. Faustino is requesting a loan in order to pay for maintenance labor. He will also buy compost for his lime crops. The loan will help him to generate more income for his family, which will improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for labor and to buy compost for his lime crop.

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Это Мунира. Её всего 20 лет. Она молодая жительница города Душанбе. Мунира замужем и пока не имеет детей. Она талантливая и активная девушка. Мунира выбрала деятельность шитье. Ей научила, как кроит, и сшить одежду ее тетя. Сейчас  у Мунире все получается хорошо. Она уже 5 лет продвигает свою любимую делу. В швейном деле ей нравится сшить разное платье и общение с клиентами. Мунира  хочет  купить себе компьютер, но она не смогла копить денег для компьютера. Ей очень нужно компьютер. Из-за нехватки денег она просит кредит. Вы можете помочь Мунире с финансовыми трудностями.  Она ждет Вашу доброту.
texts.en:
This is Munira. She is only 20 years old, and she is a young resident of Dushanbe. Munira is married and does not yet have children. She is a talented and energetic young woman. Munira has chosen sewing as her profession. Her aunt taught her how to cut out and sew clothing. Everything has worked out well for Munira, and she has been advancing in this labor of love for 5 years now. In her sewing business, she likes to sew different dresses and talk to clients. 

Munira wants to buy herself a computer, but she has not been able to save the money for one. She really needs the computer. Because of this shortage of money, she has requested a loan. You can help Munira with her financial difficulties. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a very hard working entrepreneur from Manila, Philippines. She is 35 years old and has three children who are currently in school. She manages a buy-and-sell business of ready-to-wear products, specifically bridal gowns. Her income from the business is helping with her family's everyday needs and expenses.

What she basically does is buy general merchandise from wholesalers and then sell them piecemeal to make a little profit. Customers are attracted to buy due to the low selling prices and the many options they are offered. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.

Rosemarie is requesting a 20,000 PHP loan to purchase more bridal gowns and other like products. She will use her loan to improve her sales and the additional revenue to improve the general living conditions of her family.

In the future, she hopes to have her own stall or branch for her business. She also desires for her children to be able to complete their studies as well as to improve the general living condition of her family through saving. She meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to purchase more bridal gowns and other like products.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
La Señora Clotilde, es casada, vive con su marido y sus hijos, en su propia cada que con mucho esfuerzo pudo tener. Ella  se encuentra trabajando en la despensa que con sacrificio monto desde hace varios años, cuenta con una clientela ya formada, también alquila carros para vendedores ambulantes, chatarreros, etc.
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de productos para la venta en su despensa, como ser carne, verduras, frutas, bebidas y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Sra. Clotilde is married and lives with her husband and children. With great effort, she was able to achieve what she has on her own. She works at her food pantry, which she was able to establish after many years of sacrifice. Clotilde has an established clientele. She also rents out cars to traveling merchants, scrap metal collectors, and other businesspeople.

Clotilde is requesting this loan so that she can buy products to sell at her food pantry such as meat, vegetables, fruits, beverages, and other items. She appreciates the opportunity she has received so that she can keep growing.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, fruits, beverages, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Lino

texts.es:
El Sr. Lino está casado con la señora Amada. Él se dedica hace varios años a la venta ambulante de mandioca, son una pareja muy trabajadora y por sobre todo luchadora.
Su esposa es comerciante y vende productos como poroto, harina de maíz, maíz, manteca y otros de manera ambulante. El comenta que pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de materiales de construcción para poder mejorar su casa, y con ello poder también a la vez mejorar el negocio de su esposa.
texts.en:
Sr. Lino is married to Sra. Amada. He has been selling cassava as a street merchant for several years. Lino and his wife are a hardworking couple, but above all else, they are determined.

His wife is a merchant who sells products such as beans, cornmeal, corn, lard, and other products as a street merchant. Lino says that he is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the purchase of construction materials for making improvements to his home. At the same, this will also help to improve his wife’s business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Unidas 2 está en su ciclo número 3° Del programa de comité de mujeres, también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Catalina.
Ella ese dedica a ser modista, confecciona todo tipo de prendas y comenta que siempre tiene muchos pedidos, es por ello que le va muy bien y está mejorando por medio de su trabajo. Catalina es una persona muy trabajadora y por sobre todo muy luchadora.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar telas, hilos, gomas, botones, cierres y otros, y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir ayudando a sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group named “Mujeres Unidas 2” (United Women 2) is in its third loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. The members are also taking the poverty elimination survey.

One of the members is Sra. Catalina, who is a seamstress. She produces all types of clothes and says that she always has many orders. This explains why she is doing very well, so she is able to improve through her work. Catalina is a hardworking person, but above all else, she is very determined. She is requesting a loan in order to buy fabrics, thread, elastics, buttons, zippers, and other supplies. As a result, she will be able to continue her work just as before. She appreciates the opportunity she has received so that she can continue helping her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, elastics, buttons, zippers, and other supplies.

loans.name: Rosalio

texts.es:
El socio Rosalio se sigue dedicando al negocio de distribucion de productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar y leche,el socio lleva a las diferentes tiendas de abarrotes,el socio es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora que por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño del socio es tener una tienda de abarrotes.El socio solicita el credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y aceite.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosalio continues his business distributing food staples such as rice, sugar, and milk. He supplies the various grocery stores.

He is an enterprising and hard-working person, who wants to support his family through this business.

His dream is to have a grocery store himself. He is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and oil.

He is thankful for the loan and commits to repaying his loan on time.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and oil

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: El socio Gregorio se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura,el socio tiene un terreno donde cultiva trigo,maiz y papa ,el socio es una persona trabajadora que por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a su familia. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes y semillas.
texts.en: Gregorio continues working in agriculture. He has a plot of land where he grows wheat, corn, and potatoes. He is a hard-working person, who supports his family through this business. He is requesting the loan to buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar proviene de una familia humilde, pero con deseos de superación, para ello está siguiendo una carrera que podrá  ayudarle a formarse como un ser de bien.
Está estudiando la carrera de psicología, y con ello quiere poder abrirse camino al mundo laboral.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su préstamo y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Oscar comes from a modest family, but he has the drive to succeed. For this reason, he is continuing to pursue a degree so that he can become a successful individual.

Oscar is studying for a degree in Psychology, which will open doors for him in the workplace. He is requesting this loan so that he can pay his fees. As a result, he can continue his studies just as before.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La señora Sonia está casada con el Sr. Carlos, tienen una  hija de 7 años, quien es su mayor motivación para poder seguir trabajando y esforzándose cada día.
Anteriormente la señora se dedicaba a ser auxiliar de enfermería y farmacia también en la docencia, y luego con los años estudió la carrera de fisioterapeuta que es su profesión actualmente.
Pide este préstamo para poder montar para su consultorio y con ello poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sra. Sonia is married to Sr. Carlos. They have a seven-year-old daughter who provides her a great amount of motivation to continue working and striving each day.

Sra. Sonia previously worked as a nursing and pharmacy assistant. She was also a teacher, but years later she earned a degree in Physical Therapy and is now in this profession.

Sonia is requesting a loan so that she can establish an office where she can continue her work just as before.

loans.use: to open an office where she can see her physical therapy patients.

loans.name: Phong's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phong, born in 1990, is a Thai ethnic woman. She lives with her husband and her daughter in Mai Son district, Son La province. 

Her family’s main occupation is cultivation and animal breeding with an annual income of VND 50 million to 60 million. However, the income after deducting all costs is just enough to cover the family’s living expense and save a little amount. She wants to expand the business model of raising cows for breeding but her savings is not enough. Therefore, she wants to borrow a loan to buy a breeding cow.	

She very much expects the loan amount will help her family to buy a breeding cow, and next year the breeding cow will bring her family some lovely calves. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan to M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to buy a breeding cow

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
This woman is Nena, 43 years old and married with three children. As a way of generating income, she has been engaged in a variety store business within her community in Manila, Philippines for six years now. Together with her husband, Jun, a driver, they are able to sustain their family’s needs. 

In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

However, due to financial insufficiency, Nena wants to make her business more profitable in order to earn a higher income. For this reason, she would like to request a loan amounting to 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) for additional principal that she would use to buy more grocery items that are needed. She is hoping that she will further improve the business through this financial assistance.

Nena’s dream is very simple.  She only hopes for her family to always be in good condition and health. And this will only be made possible if her business is maintained. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items that are needed in her business.

loans.name: Sulia

texts.en: Sulia is a 25 year old single woman with no child. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for 3 years. Sulia has requested a loan to buy sacks of flour, sugar, yeast, oil, etc. She joined SPBD in 2015 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Sulia will use it to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, sugar, yeast, oil, etc.

loans.name: Arjuna Group

texts.en:
The Arjuna group from Baturiti, Tabanan in the middle part of Bali would like to thank the lenders, Kiva and MUK for their support. Ni Wayan, the group’s treasurer, purchased merchandise for her kiosk with her loan and sold the fast food around her beautiful village. With her profits, and with the help of a new loan from MUK, she plans to purchase local piglets.  With the overall increase in household income, she has supported the daily needs of her family and saved for sudden needs.

The Arjuna group got a loan for the second time. The number of group members is 10 and the total loan is 20,000,000 IDR. Having been successful with her small kiosk business, Ni Wayan used this loan to purchase four types of local pigs for pig barbeque and will maintain them for two months. The remainder of her loan was used to buy feed. The price of pig feed is currently very expensive, but she remains optimistic about the business going forward.  With all the benefits she gets, she plans to repair her home and save capital for her pig business.

loans.use: to purchase four types of local pigs and feed

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 37 year old married woman living with her spouse and child in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 
She belongs to a poor family and they are passing their lives by hand to mouth. He cherishes his entire family. Her husband owns a small clothing shop where he sells ladies and gents clothes and he has been running this business for many years. It is his misfortune that he could not built up a good relationship among his customers, this is the reason he could not establish his business. 
Now with an increase in household expenses, he considers it necessary to grow the business. But the lack of capital is a major problem for her husband.  
Therefore, Parveen took out a loan for her husband’s business. With the help of this loan, her husband will purchase more clothes to sell. 
Parveen thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more clothing for her husband's clothing sale business

loans.name: Olomatamata

texts.en: Olomatamata is 35 years old and a partner (for 10 years) with five children. She runs a small business selling chips, pancakes, buns, doughnuts, etc. in her community and has been doing this for two years. Olomatamata has requested a loan to buy sacks of flour, sugar, yeast, oil, etc. She joined SPBD in March 2015 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Olomatamata will improve her business and support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, sugar, yeast, and oil

loans.name: Sayfiddin

texts.en:
Sayfiddin is an active man. He was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1994. He is living in a small town where people go to get a higher education and then work in their specialty. He is married and has one child. 

Sayfiddin is a responsible, honest and creative person. He is a fourth year student at university, and is well known among his friends and fellow students. In the future, he wants to be a diplomat and to work in his motherland. However he is not working yet and cannot pay the tuition fees for his studies. Therefore he has requested a loan from IMON and Kiva lenders to cover his university tuition fees. 

He really hopes to be supported.

loans.use: To pay university tuition fees

loans.name: Sululosi

texts.en:
Sululosi is a 65-year-old woman who is married with 5 children. 

She runs a business sewing and selling clothes in her community, and she has 4 years' experience with this business. She has requested a loan to buy materials, needles, threads, a sewing machine, etc. She plans to use her profits to improve her business. 

She joined SPBD in 2015 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy materials, needles, a sewing machine, etc.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy has faithfully paid back her previous loan, which she used for her business. She has been operating her own rug-making business for years and she earns well from this. Having a bigger responsibility requires more effort to provide for their needs, especially for her children. She had to work hard, with the determination of having a better income, to provide her children with a better education. 

To improve her profit, Joy would like to apply for a new loan. With PHP 12,000, she could already purchase more quantities of raw materials like fabric, thread and other materials for her business. She sincerely lets you know her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Joy hopes to grow her business as well as improve the living condition of her family and give her children a better education. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fabrics and other materials for her rug-making business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Legoga

texts.en:
Legoga is a 48-year-old woman who is married with 3 children. 

She owns and operates a small store selling a variety of products such as canned goods, flour, sugar and toiletries. She has 20 years of experience with this business. 

Legoga has requested a loan to buy sacks of flour, sugar, boxes of canned goods, chickens, a freezer, etc. She plans to use her profits to grow her business. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2011.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour, sugar, boxes of canned goods, chickens, a freezer, etc.

loans.name: Mukaddas

texts.en: Mukaddas is a strong woman. She was born in the beautiful mountainous country of Tajikistan in 1971. She is living in a rural area with her family. She is married and has three children. She has been in business for about ten years and has a lot of experience in agriculture. She started her business with the help and support of her relatives and family. Thanks to them, she now has a good business and can feed her family with her income. She plants cereals and keeps livestock. She has good conditions to keep cattle and good land to plant agricultural products. Recently, she has had some difficulty in having a good harvest because there was not enough rain and the land become salty. Mukaddas is asking for financial support from KIVA lenders to buy fertilizers and natural chemicals to reprocess her land and have a good harvest this coming season. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and natural chemicals to reprocess her land and gain a good harvest in the  coming season

loans.name: Safia

texts.en: Safia is an energetic young lady and is well-trained in sewing clothes. She belongs to a middle class family and wants to support her family through her abilities. The main reason she has been running a small boutique is to earn more income to support her family. Her husband also supports and encourages her profession as he brings different varieties of designer clothing from markets and Safia sews them into unique and attractive dresses. Ladies of the society like her dress collections a lot and it's why her business is running very well. Safia needs to purchase more clothing and sewing material to increase her boutique business. She is requesting a loan from Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. She is thankful to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to enhance in her boutique business

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en:
Suriya is a 47 year old married woman living with her spouse and five children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.
Her husband owns a butcher shop but he earns insufficient income for his family. His daily practice is to buy beef from the market and sell it in his butcher shop. Recently he spent a huge part of his income to pay utility bills which diminished his purchasing power for new inventory for his butcher shop. 
Therefore, Suriya requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband will be able buy more fresh beef for his business. Suriya wants to provide higher education to her children. She dreams of providing all facilities of life to her children. 
She is very thankful for BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase in her husband's butcher shop

loans.name: Hudoynazar

texts.en:
Hudoynazar is a bright man. He was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1993. He is living in a small town where most residents are trying to be educated and find good work. He is married and lives with his parents. 

Hudoynazar is a fourth year student in university. He is active in classes and well-known as a clever boy among students and friends. 

He dreams of becoming a lawyer, but recently he has had some difficulties in paying the tuition fees for his studies. He found IMON’s service very attractive and has asked for a loan to pay his university tuition fees. 

He is informed about Kiva and awaits Kiva lenders' kindness.

loans.use: To pay university tuition fees

loans.name: Françine

texts.fr:
Francine est mariée, les deux époux exercent ensemble l'activité génératrice de revenu familiale: vente de sacs de voyage, cartables, sacs d'occasion à dos et friperie, et ceci depuis leur mariage, il y a 15 ans.
Elle demande un crédit pour développer encore plus son activité, avec lequel, elle va acheter des balles de sacs de voyage, cartables et sacs à dos de bonne occasion.
En général, les clients préfèrent les friperies car c'est à bon marché mais de bonne qualité. Les gens préparent déjà dès maintenant les grandes vacances en moi de juillet 2015 ainsi que la rentrée de l'année scolaire 2015-2016 en septembre 2015.
Francine a 46 ans et a trois enfants de 21, 13, et 7 ans dont les deux derniers sont scolarisés.dans une école privée. L'ainé est en cours de quête de travail mais en attendant, son occupation est d'aider ses parents dans leur activité et le ménage.
texts.en:
Francine is married and both her and her spouse have earned money for the family selling travel bags, school bags, backpacks and second-hand items since they got married 15 years ago. She is requesting a loan in order to be able to develop her business further. She will use it to buy bundles of good-value, second-hand travel bags, school bags and backpacks. The customers generally prefer second-hand items because they are better value but still good quality. People are already getting ready for the summer holidays in July as well as the beginning of the 2015-2016 school year in September.

Francine is 46 years old and has 3 children aged 21, 13 and 7, the latter two of whom attend a private school. The eldest child is currently looking for work and, while he does so, is busy helping his parents with their business and the household chores.

loans.use: to buy more second-hand travel bags, school bags and backpacks.

loans.name: Salvadora De Jesus

texts.es:
Salvadora, de 54 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está casada y su esposo es agricultor, tiene 3 hijos, pero ninguno depende de ella.

Salvadora, ha tenido venta de tortillas desde hace 7 años. 

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar maíz para hacer las tortillas.

Ella sueña con apoyar en la economía y educación de sus nietos, para que se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Salvadora is 54 years old and has a third-grade education. She is married; her husband is a farmer. Salvadora has three children, none of whom still depend on her.

Salvadora has made a living selling tortillas for seven years.

This loan will be used to buy corn to make tortillas.

Salvadora’s dream is to support her grandchildren financially and in their education so that they have a good education.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Wilfredo Ricardo

texts.es:
Wilfredo, de 24 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está soltero y su única obligación, es apoyar en los gastos de sus padres, porque no quiso seguir estudiando.

Wilfredo, se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura y en la ganadería, ya que su familia siempre se ha dedicado a este trabajo.

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar ganado, ya que él siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura y la ganadería. 

Wilfredo, sueña con tener mucho ganado y formar una familia.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is 24 years old and has a ninth-grade education. He is single and his only responsibility is to help his parents with household costs. Wilfredo did not want to continue in education.

Wilfredo works in farming and cattle-raising as that is what his family has always done.

Wilfredo will use this loan in order to buy cattle. He has always worked in farming and cattle-raising.

Wilfredo dreams of having much more cattle and of starting a family.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Neme

texts.fr: Madame Néme âgée de 52ans, a 04 enfants en charge. Elle est revendeuse de charbons de bois et s'approvisionne à Anié une ville du TOGO depuis 1997. Pour renforcer son activité, elle demande un quatrième crédit pour acheter des marchandises. Elle souhaite à l'avenir, agrandir son activité et assurer l'auto-suffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en: Néme is 52 years old and takes care of 4 children. She sells charcoal and has been getting her supplies in Anié, a town in Togo, since 1997. She is requesting a 4th loan in order to buy some merchandise and strengthen her business. In the years to come, she would like to expand her business and ensure her family's food self-sufficiency.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Ama Dogbeda

texts.fr: Madame Ama Dogbeda âgée de 33ans, a des enfants en charge. Elle est revendeuse de sels et s'approvisionne à Accra depuis 2000. Pour renforcer son activité, elle demande un sixième crédit pour acheter des marchandises. Elle souhaite à l'avenir, agrandir son activité et assurer l'auto-suffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ama Dogbeda is 33 years old, and has children to care for.

She is a retailer of salt and stocks up in Accra since 2000. To bolster her activity, she is requesting a sixth credit loan to buy goods.

In the future she wants to expand her business and ensure her family's food self-sufficiency.

loans.use: buy salt

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Mère d'un enfant de 06ans qui est scolarisé, Adjo pour apporter son bien - être à la famille revend de l'eau de javel, du balsam.... à domicile. Elle s'approvisionne à Accra et exerce seule son activité depuis 2009. Elle désire améliorer son activité, c'est pour cela, elle sollicite un quatrième prêt à WAGES pour acheter des marchandises. Elle souhaite élargir son activité, assurer l'éducation et la santé de la famille. Adjo est âgée de 29ans.
texts.en:
Mother of a six-year-old child who is in school, Adjo retails bleach, balsam, .... from her home, to ensure her family's well-being.

She stocks up in Accra and has been operating on her own since 2009. She wants to improve her business, which is why she is requesting a fourth loan from WAGES to buy goods.

She wants to expand her business, and ensure her family's education and health. Adjo is 29 years old.

loans.use: Buy balsam, bleach and others

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr: Komlan, jeune homme de 23ans est informaticien de profession. Il fait des copies aux clients et désire acheter une nouvelle machine. Il sollicite un second prêt pour atteindre l'objectif fixé. Il souhaite ouvrir un second atelier et assurer la bonne éducation des futures progénitures.
texts.en:
Komlan is 23 years old and is a professional computer scientist.  He has requested this loan in order to buy a new photocopier for his business.

In the coming years, Komlan would like to open a second workshop and provide a good education for his future children.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier for his business.

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits de détails(couches, habits pour bébé, produits cosmétique...) depuis un certain temps, madame Yawa âgée de 42ans se bat chaque fois pour donner le meilleur d'elle même à sa famille. Elle souhaiterait stocker plus de marchandises afin de garder ses clients. Le troisième crédit lui servira d'acheter des produits cosmétiques, des habits pour bébé et des couches... Elle espère devenir grossiste et aider sa famille à mieux s'épanouir.
texts.en: Yawa is 42 years old and has been selling retail products (diapers, baby clothing, beauty products, etc.) for a while. She always fights to do her best for her family. She would like to have a larger inventory so that she can keep her customers. This 3rd loan will allow her to buy items like beauty products, baby clothing and diapers. She would like to become a wholesaler and to help her family develop more fully.

loans.use: to buy perfume, baby clothing and diapers.

loans.name: Adjoavi

texts.fr: Veuve de 49ans, Adjoavi a en charge 01 enfant de 27ans. Pour apporter son bien - être à son enfant, elle revend des produits d'alimentation générale depuis 2000 et s'approvisionne au Grand Marché de Lomé. Avec son sixième crédit, elle va s'approvisionner en marchandises(tomate en boite, huile végétale, riz, lait...) Comme perspectives d'avenir, elle souhaite avoir un grand local et assurer l'avenir de la famille.
texts.en: Adjoavi is 49-year-old widow with a 27-year-old dependent child. In order to be able to ensure her child's well-being, she has been selling groceries since 2000 and gets her supplies at the Lomé Grand Market. She will use her 6th loan to buy merchandise (tinned tomatoes, vegetable oil, rice, milk, etc.). Her future goals include having a large retail space and securing her family's future.

loans.use: to buy grocery products.

loans.name: Maisha Ni Siri Ya Mungu Group

texts.fr: Suite au blocage des autres activités, Sebihendo s'est lancé dans la culture du riz en 1998. Malgré les difficultés liées au financement de travaux champêtres, la période de récolte facilite la couverture des charges familiales. Il espère grâce à cette activité régulariser sa situation matrimoniale auprès de l'état civil et améliorer son habitat. Président du groupe MAISHA NI SIRI YA MUNGU, il tient sur la photo un carnet rose.
texts.en:
Sebihendo is the president of the 'Maisha Ni Siri Ya Mungu' Group, he is seen holding a pink booklet in the photo.  He began growing rice in 1998 after his other income earning activities ceased.

Despite the difficulties of financing work in his fields, Sebihendo is able to cover the costs of his family thanks to the income he earns during the harvest season.

Sebihendo would like to use the income this loan will generate to officially settle his marital situation and improve his home.

loans.use: to pay for work to harrow and sow seed in his fields and buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Vyaragarutse Group

texts.fr:
Thérance fait partie du groupe  Vyaragarutse et  habite à  Gitega. Il a 29 ans et est marié à Jeanne, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants l'un a 2 et l'autre 3 ans.

Il fait le commerce du  riz, du haricot, du sucre,...,   depuis  7 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz et  de haricot  à revendre pour gagner plus.
texts.en: Thérance is a member of the Vyaragarutse group and lives in Gitega. He is 29 years old and married to Jeanne, a farmer. The couple have 2 children, aged 2 and 3 years old. He has been selling products like rice, beans and sugar for 7 years. This is his first loan from Turame. This Kiva-sponsored loan will increase his capital and allow him to buy a large quantity of rice and beans for resale, so that he can earn more money.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of rice and beans for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for work in his field and buy fertilizer and phytosanitary products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to bring in fruit and expand her business.

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.es:
La socia Benedicta  se dedica al negocio de agricultura, ella tiene un terreno donde cultiva cacao y café, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Benedicta works in the business of agriculture, she has a plot of land where she farms cacao and coffee. She works from 6:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She has been working in this business for several years and it is going well. Her dream is to expand her plot of land. She is asking for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer.
She is very happy with loan and she is committed to meet all the payments.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes, de 50 años de edad, estudió hasta quinto grado y es madre soltera, solo tiene un hijo.

Mercedes, trabaja en la sastrería desde hace más de 7 años.

Ella, necesita el préstamo para la remodelación de su casa.

Mercedes, sueña con mejorarla, para que su hijo viva bien con su futura familia.
texts.en:
Mercedes, who is 50 years old, studied until the fifth grade and is a single mother, she has only one son.
Mercedes has worked as a tailor for more than 7 years. 
She needs the loan to remodel her home.
Mercedes dreams of improving her home, so that her son can live well with his future family.

loans.use: to remodel her home.

loans.name: Ayawavi

texts.fr: Ayawavi est âgée de 34ans. Elle a 01 enfant de 09 mois en charge. Elle est secrétaire et a ouvert une boutique dans laquelle, elle vend des articles informatiques et fait la photocopie et des saisies de texte. Elle est une ancienne cliente de l’institution et n’a pas eu de problèmes dans le remboursement de ses crédits passés. Elle sollicite ce huitième prêt pour acheter des appareils informatiques (ordinateur et photocopieuse). Avec le profit, elle voudrait aider son enfant dans leurs études et devenir grossiste dans la vente des appareils informatiques.
texts.en: Ayawavi is 34 years old. She is responsible for a 9-month old infant. She is a secretary and has open a shop in which she sells computer equipment and provides copying and text-grabbing services. She is a longtime customer of the microfinance institution and has not had any problems repaying her previous loans. She is requesting an 8th loan in order to buy electronic equipment (a computer and photocopier). She wants to use her profits to ensure her child gets an education and to start a wholesale business selling computer equipment.

loans.use: to buy electronic equipment.

loans.name: Virgen Asunta-Santa Elena Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN ASUNTA-ASUNTA ELENA, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de La Convencion, distrtito de Ocobamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Susana tiene 26 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio  de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le  va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, azucar, leche entre otros.
Los socios se sienten agradecidos por el crédito otorgado y se comprometen a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the VIRGEN ASUNTA-ASUNTA ELENA communal bank. The bank is located in the province of La Convencion, Ocobamba district in the department of  Cuzco.

Susana is 26 years old. She has a 1 year old son and she is single. She alternates her daily activities with her business, which is a grocery store. She has had her business for a while and it is going well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into her business every day. She wants to keep working so she can continue supporting her family in this way. 

She is asking for the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk and more. The borrowers are thankful for the loan and committed to making their payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk and more.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
El socio  Santiago se dedica al negocio de agricultura y ganaderia, el socio tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra café y platanos, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de agricultura. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member Santiago works in the business of agriculture and livestock. He has some cropland where he grows coffee and plantains. He works from 8:00 a.m until 6:00 p.m. He has already been in this business for several years and it is going very well for him. His dream is to expand the agricultural business. He s asking for the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. 

He is happy with the loan and committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
La socia Alejandra  se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura, ella tiene un terreno donde cultiva maiz y papa, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Alejandra continues to work in the agricultural business. She has some land where she grows corn and potatoes. She works from 6:00 a.m until 5:00 p.m. She has had this business for several years and it is going well for her. Her dream is to expand her cropland. She is asking for the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. 

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mauricio Adalberto

texts.es: Mauricio de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a la venta de jugos naturales y posee 2 años de experiencia, su negocio está ubicado en el centro comercial que se encuentra cerca de su casa, con las venta que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra  materia prima como: huevos, azúcar, variedad de frutas, leche, etc. que utiliza en el negocio todo por mayor y así poder tener mejor  ingreso económico para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mauricio, 36 years old, lives in his own house with his life partner. He works selling natural juices and has 2 years of experience. His business is located in the commercial center that is near his house. With the sales he makes, he manages to cover some of the household expenses. He is asking for the loan to purchase raw material such as eggs, sugar, a variety of fruits, milk, etc., which he uses in the business, all in bulk and in this way to be able to have more income in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase eggs, sugar, a variety of fruit, milk, etc.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
La socia Maura se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere que sus hijos que terminen de estudiar, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant grande. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maura continues to work in the restaurant business. She is an enterprising woman who, through this business, wants her children to finish their studies. Her dream is to have a large restaurant. She asks for the loan to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice, and meat.

loans.name: Twashitse Group

texts.fr:
Donatien  fait partie du groupe  Twashitse et  habite à  Gitega. Il a 42 ans et est marié à Daphrose ,une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 7 enfants âgés de 1 à 13 ans,dont  3 étudient. 

Il a fait le commerce de haricot,de riz,...dans sa boutique  depuis  3 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz et de haricot  à revendre pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Donatien is a member of the Twashitse group and lives in Gitega. He is 42 years old and married to Daphrose, a farmer. The couple have 7 children aged between 1 and 13, three of whom attend school. He has been selling items like rice and beans in his shop for 3 years. 

This is his 1st loan from Turame. His Kiva-sponsored loan will increase his capital and allow him to buy a large amount of rice and beans for resale, so that he can earn more money.

loans.use: to buy a large amount of rice and beans for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertiliser and plant protection products and to pay workers' wages.

loans.name: Jose Simeon

texts.es:
José, de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, debido a que decidió trabajar con su padre, porque el trabajo era mucho y su padre no alcanzaba a hacerlo todo él solo.- José, está casado y su esposa se dedica al comercio de ropa,  tienen dos hijos de las edades de 8 y 5 años, los cuales estudian.
