Many ladies have little food stands where they sell regional dishes.

The Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Mujeres Con Valor,” or “Women of Worth,” is found here. Mirna, a 23-year-old member of the Trust Bank, is a single woman who strives to generate income for her family. Using her own distinctive style and creative recipes, she sells food ranging from snacks to dinners. Mirna is requesting a loan to purchase a machine that will peel and process the fruit and add fruit ices to her menu.

Mirna and the women in the Trust Bank benefit from the monthly educational trainings with a loan officer from Friendship Bridge. Mirna especially liked the training on optimizing resources and recycling. Other topics covered include effective business management tools (budgeting, accounting, pricing, marketing, customer service), nutrition, health and hygiene. as well as goals, dreams, empowerment and self-esteem. Friendship Bridge calls the combination of education and loans “Microcredit Plus.”

Thank you, Kiva lenders, for your kindness and generosity in funding loans for women like Mirna and her friends.

loans.use: to purchase a machine that will peel and process the fruit and add fruit ices to her menu.

loans.name: Ricchary Anteña Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “RICCHARY ANTEÑA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosalbina,la socia sigue dedicándose a su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido, la socia continua vendiendo su mercadería a  todos sus clientes que le solicitan como arroz,azucar,leche entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar golosinas, gaseosas entre otros.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de panificadora, venta de frutas, internet, venta de carne.

Las socias que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde  a la reunión por  motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
The community bank Ricchary Anteña is located in the district of Anta, in the province of Anta, and department of Cusco.

Rosalbina is a member of the group.  She continues working at her grocery store.  She is grateful to everyone who is a part of making this dream happen and promises to make her repayments according to the established schedule.  She continues selling her merchandise to all her customers who request it, including rice, sugar, milk, and other items.  She wants to continue working at her store to continue supporting her family.  She is requesting this loan to purchase snacks, sodas, and other items.

The other group members work at a bakery, selling fruit, at an internet cafe, and selling meat.

The group members in the attached photos requested permission to arrive late to the meeting because of their work.

loans.use: to purchase snacks, sodas, and other items.

loans.name: Asociacion De Productores Agropecuarios Roncohuasi Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “ASOCIACION DE PRODUCTORES AGROPECUARIOS RONCOHUASI”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Limatambo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yovana ella es casada y tiene 30 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de agricultura, ella tiene un terreno donde cultiva maiz y papa, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.
Las socias que estan pegadas a la foto se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion.
Las socias que su rostro esta tapada con un circulo ya no pertenecen al banco comunal Asociacion de Productores Agropecuarios Roncohuasi. 
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ponches, negocio de carpintería, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the "Asociacion de Productores Agropecuarios Roncohuasi" communal bank.  This bank is located in the Limatambo district within the Anta province and the department of Cusco.  

The featured member is Señora Yovana.  She is married, 30 years old, has one child, and works in her agricultural business.  She has a plot of land where she grows corn and potatoes, and works from 6:00am to 5:00pm.  She has spent several years with this business and it is going very well.  Her dream is to increase the land for her crops.  She asks for the loan in order to buy seeds and fertilizer.

The members whose photos are pasted in had their photo taken after the meeting.  The members whose faces are covered with a circle no longer belong to the Asociacion de Productores Agropecuarios Roncohuasi communal bank.

The other members make a living through a business of selling punch, a carpentry business, a grocery store business, and a restaurant.  Yovana is grateful to those who form a part of her dream in this way, and she promises to complete her repayments in the established term.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.
